tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: rooney to be honest is not a big game player who would you have rooney or﻿ van persie van the man every day of the week

maar wij hebben﻿ tenminste 20kampioentitels jullie niet wij hebben er 31 dus zuig me lul.
as a united fan i dont mind arsenal because they play good football﻿ its liverpool and chelsea i really cant fuckin stand
dude but recently we have been losing them u﻿ dopy face
In this game we see﻿ the character off player man utd.salute to paul scholes,and van persie will become a superstar man utd player.glory glory man utd

How to Defence Kagawa.(web translation) It is easy to press down Kagawa. What is necessary is only to body-bring near and just to carry out an adhesion mark, as Hosogai and Uzbekistan did.It was very effective. Since Kagawa is weak in a hit, and since a front is not turned,Kagawa can't uses his agility, nothing becomes impossible.He always lost ball when﻿ it did. Kagawa can only get goal when he is shadow stiriker. So Keisuke Honda is absolute center half in Japanese A member.
'From Malaysia' says it﻿ all really, please shut up when you're obviously a muppet.
Wat a﻿ low blow to arsenal....ha ha ha ha

Possibly the biggest moron ever, Carrick is one of our best players, completely underrated. Cleverley is 23 and still gaining experience, he'll be a﻿ top player soon, to say he is dull is ridiculous. Anderson is a great player if he can stop getting injured so often, very promising so again, you're an idiot. Fletcher is our closest thing to a DM which we desperately need, when he comes back you'll see a huge difference. Congratulations on being a clueless tool.
foreigners are﻿ just crazy .... see they reaction to vasell when he went abroad ITS DARIUS VASSEL FFS NOT MARADONA

i'm totally not agree with u idiot!valencia has its own unique pace and strong crosses so dont call him bullshit.u dont even know how to play football!!and one more thing evra is a﻿ good defender,always supporting the striker and seldomly injured,although he do make some stupid mistakes

Fuck You i dont know about football...I admit Buttner is better than Fabio..thats why SAF lent Fabio to QPR..to maximize his talent..I'm talking about Evra, bullshit.. not anyone else.. Whats ur word that Evra will not make mistake again next game, pal..? I wont say that bcoz I know every time that France rubbish is playing, United have to be ready to concede at least a goal coming from his side..I think I know football since ur father was 5 years﻿ old..
fergie said that he bought﻿ buttner for that reason u arse wipe, he's bettr than fabio by miles, stronger, and better technically, u dont know shit about football so stop pretending
what are you a ugly liverpool fan dirty scousers always think this is they year hahahahahhaha﻿
Fuck you, you dirty man u cunt fan below me﻿
man utd﻿ is best team

hahaha...Valencia is good??﻿ haha..America's funniest video.. The fact is..Valencia cant open the game without least a playing backing him from his back.. Nani isnt like that..Nani plays like CR...no need anyone else when he wants to make something.. Bodoh....
grammer rapist﻿

what you on about?! if you were a true MUFC supporter you would've noticed how well Kagawa played. He has something alot of outfield players dont have. and thats the﻿ skill to be unselfish! he plays good balls and has done well enough in the first 3 games to earn the respect of most supporters!

I'm not even an arsenal fan but seriously wtf are you on about?? Arsenal developed him into one of the top﻿ strikers in world football, he would be absolute scum if he did celebrate in adebayor style.
yes i know my dad was once 5 years old dumbfuck, and how does that make any sense ur pretty much the﻿ shittiest troll ever who doesnt know shit about football
nah man you are not a die hard﻿ man utd fan. You're a racist cunt
